price: 42. ama hadal curraafle, yaraa intaad waantowdaan.
arabic: وَلَا بِقَوۡلِ كَاهِنٖۚ قَلِيلٗا مَّا تَذَكَّرُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: walā biqawli kāhinin qalīlan mā tadhakkarūna
